title: From educators desk: Are you using AI or is AI using you?
description: Artificial Intelligence has quietly entered our lives, in classrooms, in homes, and even on our study tables. What once sounded futuristic is now a daily companion for many students. From generating ideas to finding solutions, AI tools promise speed, clarity, and convenience. But as we welcome this powerful technology into our lives, an important question deserves attention: are we using AI wisely, or are we slowly allowing it to use us?
